com.lti.swtutils
Class DefaultMessageBox

java.lang.Object
  com.lti.swtutils.DefaultMessageBox

public final class DefaultMessageBox
extends java.lang.Object

Provides convenient way to automatically set title, and otherwise code message boxes with a minimum of code. Also allows the ability to swap out the message box code, for custom message boxes.

Author:
Ken Larson
